stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner cannot use programs for the remainder of this run. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 core damage. Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 core damage.
